title: input file error
body:
Hi am trying to detect the haplotypes from genome, when i run this code its producing the following error,

*** Initiating program ...

*** Step 1 of 6 : Checking files and executables ...

  * /usr/ajeyadata/DAGCHAINER/run_DAG_chainer.pl is working.

  * blastn is working.

  * makeblastdb is working.

  * Error : Input fasta file must not contain "|" symbol !!!

*** Exiting ***

whereas my fasta file doesnt contain "|" symbol anywhere
